import { useQuery } from '@tanstack/react-query'
import apiClient from '../apiClient'
import { Comment } from '../types/CommentType'


export const useGetCommentsQuery = (slug:s) =>
  useQuery({
    queryKey: ['comments'],
    queryFn: async () => (await apiClient.get<Comment[]>(`api/projects/${slug}`)).data,
  })
